title: Arabic "white language" demystified [Response to Prof. Arguelles' 'Arabic Unity' video]

media:group.media:title: Arabic "white language" demystified [Response to Prof. Arguelles' 'Arabic Unity' video]
media:group.media:description:
Alexander Arguelles' original video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pcc-eE7OrXU
Follow me here: https://www.mezzoguild.com/
This is in response to a recent email question I received asking about Arabic "white language" and whether or not it's useful for communication by learners.
